track.name: Soldiers
comments: spent my saturdays in Brixton, where did my music come from?
these are the stations I came up with the searching with Roots Reggae, good, how do I make the music mine?  downloading, playing it in my car whatever I want it all of the time!!!!
How can you not like these guys, love them

I listen to all my reggae on xbox 360...I grow up with all this music....surruond sound is kikka....I wach ..steel pulse,bob marly,third world jacob miller,israel vibration,peter tosh,yellow man...and many others ...live on stage!nuthin ga mo soul than reggea!....
I've said it before and I will say it again; Steel Pulse is the best living reggae band out there and if you haven't seen them perform, you're missing out!
that is the way of savages and worshipers of vanity brotha kolanji

What a line... "one moment at peace with nature, victims of a massacre". One love.  "We had our shields, we had our sticks but there guns were faster/prepare for a slaughter." sums up European colonization, I wish they taught this is colleges and universities. good stuff.
one moment at peace with nature/ victims of the massacre.
